metrics.label: Organic matter
metrics.description: Stored plant material that keeps soil springy and full of life.

metrics.label: Fine particles (clay)
metrics.description: Clay helps soils hold onto water and nutrients.

metrics.label: Coarse particles (sand)
metrics.description: Sand keeps soils light and free-draining.

metrics.label: Nutrient capacity
metrics.description: Higher values mean the soil can store more nutrients for roots.

metrics.label: Total nitrogen
metrics.description: Plant-available nitrogen that drives leafy growth.

metrics.label: Soil density
metrics.description: How tightly packed the soil is—a guide to compaction and aeration.
